Articles.Content:
Anyone know where to get this? http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=631.0

The link doesn\'t seem to work anymore. Looked pretty cool, so I wanted to see it in action myself
A quick check of his user page shows the OP\'s still checking in; you could send him a PM about it and see if he\'s got the skins around still.

Thanks. Didn\'t think to check that, though I should have known better.

PM sent . If I can get a link to a good file (if he has one), I will post it if he allows it. Such a cool looking texture, it can\'t be lost to time!
